content.html: My first job upon arriving in the UK from Lebanon was cleaning floors I would say good morning to colleagues & wouldn't recieve a response Today I'm an NHS psychiatrist in London & I said good morning to my colleague who cleans floors The huge smile on his face was priceless
content.value:
My first job upon arriving in the UK from Lebanon was cleaning floors

I would say good morning to colleagues & wouldn't recieve a response

Today

I'm an NHS psychiatrist in London & I said good morning to my colleague who cleans floors

The huge smile on his face was priceless
